attributes.action: bring back the Death Sentance in light of Mr Newloves Murder in Warrington.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: .  These three scum bags knew what they were doing in attacking Mr Newlove and kicking him in the way that they did.  People are using alcohol as an excuse but i believe these scumbags would have commited this murder with or without any other influences because violence is all that they knew and that is inherant of there upbringing and parenting.  I would also like to see these convicted murderers on trial again and then sentenced to death.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
